snippet.title: Smart City Plan - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1074180/Smart_City_Plan/
Website: https://www.ambieragames.com/smartcityplan/

Smart City Plan is a modern city builder game: Plan zones, roads, public transport like trains, trams, buses, subways and even the hypertube. Set taxes and policies and implement smart city technologies. 

The game is currently in development, but can be preordered already on its website: https://www.ambieragames.com/smartcityplan/
